metadata.description: A massive, abandoned church built by the pre-apocalyptic world's most brilliant engineers. Its spire still stands, a twisted metal monolith piercing the sky like a shard of glass.
metadata.atmosphere: Eerie, beautiful, and slightly ominous, with an air of reverence for the lost civilization that built it.
metadata.significance: Ancient repository of knowledge and technology, where Vivas Guardians can uncover clues to the mysterious forces driving the post-apocalyptic world.
